definition: to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]

sentences.english: The computer is going to kill me.
Those routine jobs really kill me.
sentences.chinese: 那些日常瑣事真的要把我逼死了。

sentences.english: Lin mother to flood home crying, accusing them of the product such as BiSi.
sentences.chinese: 林母到洪家哭鬧，指責他們逼死了品如。

sentences.english: You don't think It's killing me ?
sentences.chinese: 你不認爲這是在逼死我嗎？
不要當殉道者把自己給逼死。
